description: Everyone knows you gotta clean the pipes before a night on the town. However you do it, make sure you blow a wad so you can last later if you need to. Most guys accomplish this by jerking off in the shower or by throwing on a quick, hot clip and rubbing one out. Luckily for Marcus Mojo and his pals, Rod Daily, Tyler  Hunt, and Zack Blake, friends have each other's backs. And in this case, that means a steamy bathroom fuck fest!Watch these four hunks suck each other off in preparation for club night and check out the fiery hot Rod Daily pound Marcus's sweet hole. This is what friends are for! Enjoy!
title: Getting Loose Before The Clubs
